english.segment1: Arms nailed down, Are you tellin me something?. Eyes turned out, Are you looking for someone?
english.segment2: This is the one thing, The one thing that I know.
english.segment3: Blood-stained brow, Are you dying for nothing?. Flesh and blood, Is it so elemental?
english.segment4: This is the one thing, The one thing that I know. This is the one thing, The one thing that I know.
english.segment5: Blood-stained brow, He wasn't broken for nothing. Arms nailed down, He didn't die for nothing.
english.segment6: This is the one thing, The one thing that I know. This is the one thing, The one thing that I know.
english.segment7: This is the one thing, The one thing that I know. This is the one thing, The one thing that I know.
